articles.description: Celtic overcame "so many issues" to clinch their 12th Scottish Premiership title in the last 13 seasons, says manager Brendan Rodgers.
articles.title: Celtic: Brendan Rodgers says side overcame 'issues' to win Scottish Premiership

articles.description: Man Utd manager Eric Ten Hag said the club want to keep Bruno Fernandes after the midfielder was vague on his future.
articles.title: Bruno Fernandes future: Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag wants to keep midfielder at Old Trafford

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text updates as Chelsea visit Tottenham looking to keep pace in the Women's Super League title race.
articles.title: WSL LIVE: Tottenham Hotspur v Chelsea stream, score & text updates

articles.description: Premier League clubs will vote on whether to scrap video assistant referees (VAR) from next season at their annual general meeting next month.
articles.title: VAR: Premier League clubs to vote on whether to scrap video assistant referees

articles.description: Dragons wing Ashton Hewitt aims to encourage more rugby players to open up over mental health issues.
articles.title: Mental health: Ashton Hewitt 'overwhelmed' by racist abuse

articles.description: Rasmus Hojlund breaks his 10-game scoring drought to seal victory for Manchester United in a thrilling Old Trafford encounter with Newcastle.
articles.title: Manchester United 3-2 Newcastle United: Rasmus Hojlund ends goal drought as home side win thriller

articles.description: Tiger Woods will be given "space" to decide if he wants to be US Ryder Cup captain against Europe at Bethpage in 2025.
articles.title: US Ryder Cup captain: Tiger Woods to get time to decide on role against Europe at Bethpag

articles.description: Chelsea midfielder Cole Palmer says European qualification would be a "step in the right direction" for the west London club.
articles.title: Cole Palmer: Europe a 'step in right direction' for Chelsea

articles.description: How Oleksandr Usyk went from undisputed cruiserweight champion to one fight away from emulating the feat at heavyweight.
articles.title: Tyson Fury vs Oleksandr Usyk: How Ukrainian transformed into heavyweight champion

articles.description: Williams driver Alex Albon signs a new contract with the team until the end of 2026.
articles.title: Alex Albon signs new long-term deal with Williams
